data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Name one living person who you would change places with for one week. Why do you think this person's life would be enjoyable for you? What would you hope to learn in that week?
data.answer: If I could change places with another person for a week, I would swap with my cousin. This is because she is a very successful businesswoman. She is a manager in a multinational company where she gets to travel frequently around the world. Meanwhile, she earns more than enough money to have a comfortable life. What's more, she is rather pretty and elegant. She is quite sociable and extroverted, so people very much enjoy spending time with her. I really hope that I can learn some of her interpersonal skills as I have always been bad at interacting with people. If I could change places with her for a week, I suppose I could travel to New York on a business trip, staying in decent hotel her company has reserved for her, dinning in a highly-rated restaurant while meeting clients, etc. After the work is completed, I could probably visit famous tourist attraction there, and do some shopping as well. How wonderful it would be! (165字)
